import Breadcrumb, { BreadcrumbItem } from "../../components/Breadcrumb"; import Layout from "../../components/Layout"; import { useForm } from "../../cores/useForm"; import '../../assets/custom.scss'; export default function ContactUs(){ let {register, form, handleSubmit, error} = useForm(); const submit = (form) => { console.log('form', form); } return( Home Contact Ust
{/* Heading */}

Contact Us

{/* Heading */}
Call to Us:
{/* Text */}

We're available from 10 am - 10 pm EST, 7 days a week.

Customer Service:
6-146-389-574

Careers:
6-146-389-574

{/* Divider */}
{/* Heading */}
Write to Us:
{/* Text */}

Fill out our form and we will contact you within 24 hours.

Customer Service:
customer@example.com

Careers:
careers@example.com

{/* Divider */}
{/* Heading */}
Find Us:
{/* Text */}

Want to visit our Offline Stores?

{/* Button */}

Go to Store Locator

{/* Form */}
{/* Email */}
{ error.name &&

{error.name}

}
{/* Email */}
{ error.email &&

{error.email}

}
{/* Email */}
{ error.title &&

{error.title}

}
{/* Email */}
